original_title: サイバー戦隊ジャスティオン
overview: Far away in the galaxy, the evil queen Esterzalla revives from the pitch-black darkness. With the help of a secret organization called “Gaia Force”, three girls rise from impending death to become cyborgs and battle against the evil Ancrime group! The birth of the cyber forces Pink Cat, White Bunny, Blue Swan – don’t lose, Justy One!
title: Cyber Sentai Justy One
